game.shortDescription: Enter the creative paradise of Scrap Mechanic! Build fantastic machines, go on adventures with your friends and defend against waves of evil Farmbots in this imaginative multiplayer survival sandbox. With Scrap Mechanic’s powerful creation tools you can engineer your own adventures!

reviewHighlights.text: Extremely fun game, but its been dead in devolvement for years. The last time the developers have posted anything about any update on the new section...
Genuinely love this game, I don't really touch the creative mode but the survival mode is great, but the developers have been promising a major update...
